channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: We're upping our price target on Costco after another steady quarter fortifies our thesis
item.description: The retailer's fourth-quarter results were mixed, but we have more conviction in Costco's appeal to shoppers.

item.title: Oil Rises On Concerns Over Supply Disruptions
item.description: Oil gained. ANZ Research analysts said there were fears of oil supply disruptions following a news report that Israel is considering a missile attack ...

item.title: Nike withdraws guidance, postpones investor day as it gears up for CEO change
item.description: Nike on Tuesday said it was withdrawing its full-year guidance and postponing its investor day as it gears up for a new CEO to take the helm.

item.title: Most JGBs Edge Lower, Tracking U.S. Treasurys Losses
item.description: Most JGBs edged lower in the morning Tokyo session, tracking overnight price losses of U.S. Treasurys and reversing Wednesday’s JGB price gains.

item.title: Stellantis and Aston Martin shares drop sharply after profit warnings amid China woes
item.description: Stocks of European carmakers hemorrhaged early on Monday as Stellantis and British luxury brand Aston Martin issued profit warnings.

item.title: Yen Unlikely to Stay Under Selling Pressure for Long
item.description: The yen has weakened due to receding expectations for an imminent BOJ rate hike, but the Japanese currency is unlikely to continue to be sold off one-...

item.title: People Without Kids Are Leaving Money to Surprised Heirs
item.description: The bequests benefit charities, distant relatives and even pets.

item.title: Gold Edges Higher in Likely Technical Recovery
item.description: Gold edged higher in early Asian trade in a likely technical recovery.

item.title: Levi Strauss trims guidance as it weighs sale of Dockers business
item.description: Denim-maker Levi Strauss is looking to sell its Dockers brand as the khaki maker drags down the company's overall performance.

item.title: No need to sell this AI data center play ahead of earnings — and updates on 3 more industrial stocks
item.description: Deutsche Bank listed Dover as a short-term sell idea, cautioning investors of underwhelming quarterly results later that may pressure shares later thi...
